Dataset

class dataset.ComSegDataset(path_dataset_folder=None, path_to_mask_prior=None, mask_file_extension='.tiff', dict_scale={'x': 0.103, 'y': 0.103, 'z': 0.3})

Bases: object

this class is in charge of :

  1. loading the CSV input

  2. computation of the co-expression matrix at the dataset scale

  3. add prior knowledge if available

The dataset class can be used like a dictionary of where the keys are the csv file names and the values are the csv

__init__(path_dataset_folder=None, path_to_mask_prior=None, mask_file_extension='.tiff', dict_scale={'x': 0.103, 'y': 0.103, 'z': 0.3})
Parameters

  • path_dataset_folder (str) – path to the folder containing the csv files

  • path_to_mask_prior (str) – path to the folder containing the mask priors. They must have the same name as the corresponding csv files

  • mask_file_extension – file extension of the mask priors

  • dict_scale (dict) – dictionary containing the pixel/voxel size of the images in µm default is {“x”: 0.103, ‘y’: 0.103, “z”: 0.3}

Default mask_file_extension

“.tiff”

add_prior_from_mask(prior_keys_name='in_nucleus', overwrite=False)

This function add prior knowledge to the dataset. It adds a column in the csv files indicating prior label of each spot. It takes the positon of each spot and add the corresponding value of the mask prior at this position.

Parameters

prior_keys_name – name of the column to add in the csv files containing the prior label of each spot

:type str :param overwrite: if True, overwrite the prior_keys_name column if it already exists :type bool :return: None

count_matrix_in_situ_from_knn(df_spots_label, n_neighbors=5, radius=5)

Compute the co-expression score matrix for the RNA spatial distribution

Parameters

  • df_spots_label (pd.DataFrame) – dataframe with the columns x,y,z,gene. the coordinates are rescaled in µm by dict_scale attribute of the dataset object

  • n_neighbors (int) – maximum number of neighbors default is 40

  • radius – maximum radius of neighbors. It should be set proportionnaly to expected cell size

Returns

count_matrix of shape (N_rna, n_genes) where n_genes is the number of unique genes in df_spots_label

each row is an ‘RNA expression vector’ summarizing local expression neighborhood of a molecule :rtype: np.array

compute_edge_weight(images_subset=None, n_neighbors=25, radius=1, distance='pearson', per_images=False, sampling=False, sampling_size=100000)

compute the gene co-expression correlation at the dataset scale

Parameters

  • dico_df_spots_label –

  • images_subset –

  • mode –

  • n_neighbors –

  • radius –

  • distance –

  • per_images –

  • sampling –

  • sampling_size –

Returns

dico_proba_edge : a dictionary of dictionary correlation between genes. dict[gene_source][gene_target] = correlation

Returns

count_matrix : the count matrix used to compute the correlation

Return type

dict, np.array
